typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Sno as short,
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		{Item Type} as string,
		{Sales Channel} as string,
		{Order Priority} as string,
		{Order Date} as date,
		{Order ID} as integer,
		{Ship Date} as date,
		{Units Sold} as short,
		{Unit Price} as double,
		{Unit Cost} as double,
		{Total Revenue} as double,
		{Total Cost} as double,
		{Total Profit} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SalesData
SalesData alterRow(upsertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRowUpsertIF
AlterRowUpsertIF sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SalesWithUpSertIF
